005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.markup.MarkupLine;
009
010import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.Nullable;
011
012public interface IDescribable {
013  /**
014   * The formal display name.
015   *
016   * @return the formal name or {@code null} if not defined
017   */
018  // from INamedModelElement
019  @Nullable
020  String getFormalName();
021
022  /**
023   * Get the text that describes the basic use of the element.
024   *
025   * @return a line of markup text or {@code null} if not defined
026   */
027  // from INamedModelElement
028  @Nullable
029  MarkupLine getDescription();
030
031  /**
032   * The resolved formal display name, which allows an instance to override a
033   * definition's name.
034   *
035   * @return the formal name or {@code null} if not defined
036   */
037  // from INamedModelElement
038  @Nullable
039  default String getEffectiveFormalName() {
040    return getFormalName();
041  }
042
043  /**
044   * Get the text that describes the basic use of the element, which allows an
045   * instance to override a definition's description.
046   *
047   * @return a line of markup text or {@code null} if not defined
048   */
049  // from INamedModelElement
050  @Nullable
051  default MarkupLine getEffectiveDescription() {
052    return getDescription();
053  }
054}
